QuestData.Title: Pupil No More
QuestData.Description: I once called Elder Nadox my teacher.$B$BThat changed forever when I was forced to watch him mercilessly slaughter my friends and family as a servant of the damned.$B$BFind him within the depths and make him pay for his crimes, $r.
QuestData.LogDescription: Seer Ixit in Ahn'Kahet has tasked you with the assassination of Elder Nadox.
QuestData.RewardText: With Nadox gone, I hope to take his place as a leader of my people.$B$BThe Empire of Azjol-Nerub is destined for greatness, $r...
